backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with types and in‑memory maps for users, products, categories, carts, orders, coupons, referrals, and settings, plus access control and basic query endpoints.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting categories from old format to new format by adding an image field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test coverage.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of major frontend files and components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React app and disabling caching.
frontend/README.md: Project documentation explaining features, routes, development setup, and admin/vendor access instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining all customer, admin, and vendor routes with layout wrappers.
frontend/src/components/admin/CategoryEd: Dialog for adding or editing categories with image upload, validation, and retry logic on backend failures.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog for creating or updating products with full form state, image validation, and backend retry support.
frontend/src/components/admin/StripePaym: Form for configuring Stripe secret keys and allowed countries, showing current configuration status.
frontend/src/components/category/Categor: Renders a category image with fallback handling for missing or failed image sources.
frontend/src/components/home/BannerCarou: Displays a looping carousel of home page banner images using the UI carousel component.
frontend/src/components/home/CategoriesG: Shows a clickable grid of categories with images, handling loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, footer, document title, and loading state tied to identity initialization.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer showing copyright, vendor link, and a powered‑by attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Responsive header with logo, navigation, search, auth controls, theme/language toggles, and cart count.
frontend/src/components/LoadingSkeletons: Provides skeletal loading components for products, categories, and order rows using UI skeleton elements.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductC: Displays a product card with image, price, stock status, and add‑to‑cart handling including identity checks and toasts.
frontend/src/components/product/ProductI: Renders a product image with a fallback placeholder and error handling for invalid URLs.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorDas: Vendor dashboard listing products with add, edit, and delete actions, plus error handling and dialogs.
frontend/src/components/vendor/VendorPro: Dialog for creating or editing products, handling form state, image uploads, validation, and submit mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceOrd: Mutation hook for placing orders with identity checks, backend error handling, and cache invalidation on success.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/queryClientKe: Defines and exports all React Query cache keys used throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminCatal: Admin queries and mutations for managing products and categories using an anonymous admin actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminHealt: Admin health check hook that pings the backend and tracks availability state.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAdminOrder: Admin hooks for fetching all orders and updating order statuses with appropriate cache invalidations.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useAuthz.ts: Hooks to fetch the caller’s user role and check admin authorization via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCartWishli: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cart and wishlist data, handling identity checks and backend availability errors.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCatalog.ts: Provides hooks to fetch products and categories from the backend with optional filters and caching behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCoupons.ts: Fetches all available coupons using the actor with simple enable logic.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useDashboardS: Fetches all orders using the admin actor and computes total orders and revenue.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks to fetch customer orders and a specific order with polling and identity checks.
Fetches referral user IDs for the logged‑in user keyed by their principal.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useSiteSettin: Gets and updates site settings via the admin actor, enforcing a fixed shop name and managing cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useStripe.ts: Defines hooks to check Stripe configuration and update it via the admin actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useVendorProd: Vendor‑scoped hooks for listing, adding, updating, and deleting products with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Initializes an anonymous admin‑level actor on mount for privileged operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentTitle.ts: Updates the document title to a given value or a default.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity context, loading and managing authentication state with AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Thin wrapper around next‑themes providing theme, setter, and dark‑mode boolean.
frontend/src/i18n/index.tsx: Provides a React context for language selection and a translations dictionary for English and Hindi UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color palettes and layout tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Provides category management with create, edit, delete, and backend error handling features.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCouponsPag: Shows a simple admin view listing total available coupons with loading support.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin stats for orders, revenue, and products with refresh and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLayoutPage: Defines the admin panel layout with navigation and backend health status indicator.
Shows an informational page explaining open admin access and links to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Admin UI for listing orders, handling loading/error states, and updating order statuses with sorting and status helpers.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin product management page supporting search, sorting, editing, deleting, and backend error handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Admin page for editing site settings, mainly logo upload, validation, and saving updates with error handling.
Placeholder admin user management page showing a coming‑soon message.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the user's cart with product details, quantity controls, subtotal calculation, and navigation for empty or unauthenticated states.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Displays the product catalog with filters for category, price, search text, and sorting, syncing state with URL parameters.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout flow including address form validation, cart summary, and order placement using backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with a banner, categories section, and featured products with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows a confirmation message after an order is placed and provides navigation to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/orders/MyOrdersPage.t: Displays customer orders with loading, empty states, and navigation to individual order details.
frontend/src/pages/orders/OrderDetailsPa: Shows detailed information for a single order including status, totals, and item list with loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Displays a payment failure message with options to retry checkout or return home.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Displays a success message after payment and provides navigation to orders or home.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailsPage.ts: Shows detailed product info, handles add-to-cart and wishlist actions, and manages loading or missing product states.
frontend/src/pages/profile/AddressesPage: Placeholder page indicating address management features are not yet implemented.
frontend/src/pages/profile/ProfileLayout: Profile layout with authentication check and tab navigation for profile sections.
Profile settings page allowing users to change theme and language preferences.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorPage.tsx: Vendor login page using Internet Identity that shows a dashboard when authenticated and supports login/logout handling.
frontend/src/pages/WishlistPage.tsx: Displays the user's wishlist, handles loading and empty states, and requires login to view content.
frontend/src/utils/backendAvailabilityEr: Utility for detecting backend unavailability and formatting user-friendly error messages, including IC0508 and network issues.
frontend/src/utils/orderStatus.ts: Maps order status enums to labels, colors, and provides the list of all statuses.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, animations, and layout with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, priorities, architectural notes, and known issues for the app’s development and deployment.
